name: places/ChIJUckdi2n2wokRfwbwlifpnGs
adrFormatAddress: 3200 Broadway, New York, NY 10027-2330, USA

originalText.text: Awesome Tailoring!!! I brought in a dress to be altered. I wanted the waistline higher. I got rejected from 2 other dry cleaners and even got told that what I was asking for was "impossible". This lady had no qualms. She asked for three days and boom! Amazing new waistline! I love the new look of my dress! Great job!!!

text.text: Awesome Tailoring!!! I brought in a dress to be altered. I wanted the waistline higher. I got rejected from 2 other dry cleaners and even got told that what I was asking for was "impossible". This lady had no qualms. She asked for three days and boom! Amazing new waistline! I love the new look of my dress! Great job!!!

originalText.text:
Beware cash only.

I brought some pants to be shortened. They did a perfect job at a reasonable price quickly.

I work Downtown and am used to bringing my clothes to much angrier, sloppier, more expensive tailors, so my experience with King West was doubly good.

originalText.text: They do a great job and have a super quick turn around. I use their wash and fold service, and I can drop off before heading to work and pick it up the same day when I get home. The only reason I don’t give them 5 stars is because they close at 7pm which can make it tough to get to before they close if you get caught late at work.

text.text: They do a great job and have a super quick turn around. I use their wash and fold service, and I can drop off before heading to work and pick it up the same day when I get home. The only reason I don’t give them 5 stars is because they close at 7pm which can make it tough to get to before they close if you get caught late at work.

originalText.text: I would recommend King West to anyone. I brought the head seamstress/owner a bridesmaids dress that was at least 5 inches to small and had a hug spot on it on a Monday, and by Wednesday the dress was tailored to perfection and ready to go. It's a family run business and they do quality work for an affordable price.

originalText.text: Super bad - Came here to get my clothes dry cleaned and they ripped/damaged my clothing. Then they refused responsibility and blamed me for the damaged clothes instead? Horrible service and over priced - Save your time there are better places to go in the area.
